meanings.definition: A spot or stain, especially of a contrasting color or substance.
meanings.sent1: The artist added splotches of red to the painting.
meanings.sent2: The dog's fur had splotches of white and brown.
meanings.sent3: The splotches of paint on the wall looked like a colorful map.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was covered in splotches of mud after playing outside.
meanings.sent5: The splotches of ink on the paper formed a unique pattern.

meanings.definition: To mark or cover with splotches.
meanings.sent1: She accidentally splotches the table with paint.
meanings.sent2: The rain splotches the window with water droplets.
meanings.sent3: He splotches the canvas with different shades of blue.
meanings.sent4: The chef splotches the plate with a drizzle of sauce.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully splotches the background of the artwork.
